metadata.Title: CVE-2022-41343 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: registerFont in FontMetrics.php in Dompdf before 2.0.1 allows remote file inclusion because a URI validation failure does not halt font registration, as demonstrated by a @font-face rule.

notes.Note: ccdm94> the code is not present in version 0.6.2, even though there is a register_font function in include/font_metrics.cls.php which seems to contain similar code as the registerFont function being patched in the fix commit.

criterions.comment: php-dompdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
